title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 102 x 54.5 cm (40 3/16 x 21 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 55.9 cm (22 in.)
description: All-over pattern in red of four scenes representing the four seasons: L'ete (Summer) a wagon of wheat in an open field; L'Hiver (Winter) Figures on a snow covered bank of a pond; Printemps (Spring) and Automme (Autumn) incomplete. The scenes are placed on a small scale diamond grid background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.. 1973-25-12.
